title: Lotto results LIVE: Winning numbers for Tuesday's £13million National Lottery jackpot
text:
A massive £13 million top prize was up for grabs in tonight's National Lottery draw.

Tonight’s National Lottery Lotto winning numbers are: 04, 05, 18, 29, 40, 47 and the Bonus Ball is 57. Tonight’s estimated jackpot is £13 million.

Tonight’s National Lottery Thunderball winning numbers are: 03, 12, 18, 33, 35 and the Thunderball is 13.

No one has won tonight’s jackpot.

Andy Carter, Senior Winners’ Advisor at The National Lottery, said: “It’s great news for thousands of lucky Lotto players after the jackpot rolled down when no-one matched all six main numbers to win the ‘Must Be Won’ Lotto jackpot tonight. An incredible 110,454 ticket-holders each scooped an amazing £117, instead of £30, just by matching three numbers.

“One player who matched five main numbers and the Bonus Ball is now a millionaire after winning £1.3M. All players are urged to check their tickets and claim these fantastic prizes.

“By buying a ticket for Lotto or any other National Lottery game, every player is helping to raise money for Good Causes. On average, around £30M is raised every week for projects across the UK, both big and small, including funding everything from local community projects to supporting the nation’s athletes.”

The windfall was enough to have the house and car of your dreams and banish money troubles forever.

Any winner could have been sipping cocktails on an exotic beach plotting how they were going to spend their millions.

The biggest ever Lotto winner was created in April 2016, when an anonymous player banked £35m in the draw.

In January 2016, two lucky Lotto ticket-holders walked away with a staggering £33 million each.

The Lotto results are typically drawn at 7.45pm and the Thunderball is drawn at 8.15pm.
description: The winning numbers for Tuesday's National Lottery draw are published here
